00001 #ifndef MC_CPfunction_
00002 #define MC_CPfunction_

00006 namespace MConf {
00007 
00008 //*********************************************************************
00015 class CPfunction {
00016   double c;
00017   public:
00018   CPfunction() {c=0;}
00019   virtual ~CPfunction() {;}
00026   double PF(double x,const double *parm) const  // x is the r/a
00027   {
00028     if(x<0) x=-x;
00029     if(x>1) x=1;
00030     double a=parm[0], p=parm[1], q=parm[2], h=parm[3],hole=0;
00031     if(fabs(h)>=1e-8) { // if hollow
00032       a -= h;
00033       double w = fabs(parm[4])<1e-3?1e-3:parm[4];
00034       double e = fabs((x-c)/w);
00035       hole = (e>6)?h:(h*(1-::exp(-e*e)));
00036     }
00037     double f = a + hole;
00038     if(q==0) f=1+hole;
00039     else if(x<1) f += (1-a)*::pow(1-pow(x,p),q);
00040     return (f>0)?f:1e-15; // n,T or Zeff profiles must be greater then zero
00041   }
00042 //28.09.15: need testing 
00043   void setHoleCenter(double c) {
00044     this->c=c;   // center of hole
00045   }
00046 };
00047 
00065 class  CProfile {
00066   CPfunction Pf;
00067   double a0;      // value in the center
00068   double parm[5];
00069   double ymin;
00070   double ymax;
00071   double xma;
00072   pBase::ngArray<double> x_;
00073   pBase::ngArray<double> y_;
00074   bool useAnalitic;
00075   bool doMinMax;
00076 public:
00077   CProfile() {a0=0;doMinMax=useAnalitic=false;xma=1;}
00083   CProfile(double v0, double *param) { set(v0,param);}
00089   CProfile(double v0, double g, double p,double q, double h=0, double w=0, double c=0) {
00090     parm[0] = g; 
00091     parm[1] = p; 
00092     parm[2] = q; 
00093     parm[3] = h; 
00094     parm[4] = w; 
00095     set(v0,parm);
00096     Pf.setHoleCenter(c); 
00097   }
00098 
00099   virtual ~CProfile() {;}
00108   void set(double v0, double *param,double c=0) {
00109     clear();
00110     doMinMax=useAnalitic=true;
00111     xma=1;
00112     this->a0=v0;
00113     for(int i=0; i<5; i++) this->parm[i] = param[i];
00114     Pf.setHoleCenter(c); 
00115   }
00118   void setXmax(double xmax) {
00119     xma=xmax;
00120   }
00128   void set(const double *x,const double *p,int n) {
00129     set(x,p,1,n);
00130   }
00139   void set(const double *r,const double *p,double rmax,int n) {
00140     a0=0;
00141     useAnalitic=doMinMax=false;
00142     x_.init(n);
00143     y_.init(n);
00144     ymin=ymax=p[0];
00145     xma=1;
00146     for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {
00147       x_[i] = r[i]/rmax;
00148       y_[i] = p[i];
00149       ymin = ymin>p[i]?p[i]:ymin;
00150       ymax = ymax<p[i]?p[i]:ymax;
00151       xma = xma<x_[i]?x_[i]:xma;
00152     }
00153   }
00155   void clear() {
00156     a0=0;
00157     x_.clear();
00158     y_.clear();
00159     useAnalitic=doMinMax=false;
00160     Pf.setHoleCenter(0); 
00161   }
00163   bool empty() const  {
00164     return useAnalitic?(a0==0):(x_.empty());
00165   }
00169   double operator() (const double x) const {
00170     return useAnalitic?value(x):interpolate(x); // 0<=x<=1, x = r/a
00171   }
00173   double mmin() {
00174     return empty()?0:(minmax(200),ymin);
00175   }
00177  double mmax() {
00178     return empty()?0:(minmax(200),ymax);
00179   }
00180  double xmax() {
00181     return xma;
00182   }
00185  void scale(double factor) {
00186     a0 *=factor;
00187     ymin *=factor;
00188     ymax *=factor;
00189     if(useAnalitic) return;
00190     if(empty()) return;
00191     for(int i=0; i<(int)y_.size(); i++) y_[i] *=factor;
00192   }
00193 private:
00194   // find y(x) -- linear interpolation
00195   double interpolate(double u) const  {
00196     if(x_.empty()) return 0;
00197     int L = 0;                // Left bracket
00198     int R = int(x_.size()-1); // Right bracket
00199     // perform a binary search of the segment in which u lies
00200     if(u<=x_[0]) R=1;
00201     else if(u>=x_[R]) return y_[R];  //L=R-1;
00202     else
00203       while(L+1 < R) {       // bisection
00204         int k = (L + R)/2;
00205         if(u < x_[k]) R = k;
00206         else L = k;
00207       }
00208     return (y_[L] + (y_[R]-y_[L])*(u-x_[L])/(x_[R]-x_[L]));
00209   }
00210 
00211   double value(double x) const  {
00212     x /= xma;
00213     return a0*Pf.PF(x,parm);
00214   }
00215 
00216   void minmax(int N) {
00217     if(!doMinMax) return;
00218     if(!useAnalitic) return;
00219     ymin=ymax=value(0);
00220     for(int i=1; i<=N; i++) {
00221       double x = double(i)/N;
00222       double p = value(x);
00223       ymin = ymin>p?p:ymin;
00224       ymax = ymax<p?p:ymax;
00225     }
00226     doMinMax=false;
00227   }
00228 
00229 };
00230 
00231 };   //namespace MConf
